http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4199567/Brave_New_World_-_1998_-_english</a>

Fixed the aspect ratio, cropped, improved the contrast, and encoded to mp4.  Now the file is smaller and has no perceptible quality loss, and displays properly.

This dystopian depiction of a future none too far away has roots in the book by Aldous Huxley but strays from the original, with a 90's twist all its own.

One of my favorite movies, a great scifi flick. Do enjoy.

Only the VHS PAL source is available to my knowledge, hopefully one day this fine film will be released on DVD and we will have a real dvdrip.

Until then, this will do.  Watchable quality, whose story and plot and the wonderful acting by Lenina easily make up for it.  

Sensual and timely.
